i work in marketing , and i love it.

i am a lifestyle blogger.
i m dumpy.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! What do you do for a living?
I work in marketing and I love it.
That sounds exciting! What is your favorite thing about your job?
I get to be creative and use my imagination.
That's awesome! I am a lifestyle blogger and my favorite thing about my job is that it allows me to be myself and be creative.
That's great! What is your favorite thing to blog about?
I love to blog about fashion, food, and travel.
Those are all great topics! I love to travel too. Where is your favorite place that you've been?
My favorite place that I've been is Paris.
I've always wanted to go to Paris! What was your favorite thing about it?
My favorite thing about Paris was the food!
I've heard that the food in Paris is amazing.
It really is! I think I gained weight every day that I was there.
Haha! I can understand that. I've never been a big fan of broccoli, but I had to eat an entire plate of it once.
Oh no! That sounds terrible! I'm not a big fan of broccoli either.
Me neither! But I had to do it for a health challenge.
That's a good reason! I'm glad you were able to accomplish your goal.
Thanks! I'm glad I did too.
Me too!
